page.title: 02LOCAL GOVERNMENT-HFD & WORC
page.content:
{PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT As this area is agricultural and of historic interest, there is no development envisaged before the year 2,000 in any structural plan. Residential development to the North of the grid, in the Warndon area is probable. If a continuation of the{Southern {Link road}were built on a North-South axis from Norton through Whittington to Warndon across the A44,however,it is thought by the planners that demand may be stimulated for housing in the{Swinesherd area}and along the 'spine road'.
A demand for more{rural housing}seems highly improbable because of low rural populations and mechanisation in agriculture.
